thread.title: DeMarcus Cousins is wearing panties on his head at a Mardi Gras parade
thread.title_full: DeMarcus Cousins is wearing panties on his head at a Mardi Gras parade

author: Brian
title: DeMarcus Cousins is wearing panties on his head at a Mardi Gras parade
text:
Feb 28, 2017 at 12:22p ET 0Shares 
It’s Fat Tuesday in New Orleans. That means Mardi Gras parades, and the city’s newest sports star – DeMarcus Cousins – is making himself right at home. 
Cousins and new teammate Anthony Davis were named honorary grand marshals for the Zulu parade, and Cousins – acquired nine days ago in a trade with the Kings – seemed to be enjoying himself quite a lot Tuesday morning. 
We know that because he was wearing a pair of yellow panties on his head. It's safe to say that @boogiecousins is having no problems adjusting to New Orleans. He's currently riding in Zulu with panties on his head. pic.twitter.com/F9TZC0DjwP 
— Emma Discher (@EmmaDischer) February 28, 2017 
Davis and fellow Pelican Tim Frazier joined Cousins on the float. The three will try to get their first victory with Cousins – New Orleans Is 0-3 since the trade – Wednesday against the Pistons. Anthony Davis, DeMarcus Cousins enjoy Zulu parade ride as honorary grand marshals https://t.co/8ej7VhBY37 pic.twitter.com/s2pmgDEheg
